title: Women and sexuality: a century of change (TEFC)
creator_credit: Altana Films, Dan Klugherz and Arthur Zitrin
brief_description: Provides an informative, historically accurate and entertaining history of past ideas about sexuality as well as a basis for discussion of current sexual issues. Commentary by Barbara Mitchell, Shirley Oliver, Linda Wahl and Judy Zangwill.
